alert.note: Alert for Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 11 at 8:39PM CST by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Sevier and northeastern McCurtain Counties through 915 PM CST... At 839 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Broken Bow, or 24 miles west of De Queen, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Idabel, Broken Bow, Gillham, Eagletown, Holly Creek, Glover, Hochatown, Oak Hill and Golden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
